message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $160 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I believe I can offer you $140 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down a bit to $150. I think that's very fair considering the value this product offers.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to offer $145 for the product.
